categories: Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: K'ar Zah was the Chief Scientist of the Imperial Academy of Science and Methodology.

As of 1 ABY, K'ar Zah was working on an article titled "The Superiority of Sentience: Nature's Deadliest Weapon". As Zah was in need of further case studies for his work, the scientist searched for courageous individuals to face some of the galaxy's most dangerous predators, armed with simple vibroweapons and/or primitive slugthrowers. According to Zah's theory, in eight out of ten encounters the sentient hunter would emerge victorious.
